name: Infocomm Solutions LLC
description:
Leverage the WhatsApp Business API platform. Enhance customer interactions, boost sales, and streamline marketing, sales, service, and support processes through automated WhatsApp solutions.

Introducing iOmniHub, a workspace to manage all your WhatsApp conversations, sales, and marketing to turn you and your team into revenue champions. You can also connect Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Viber, Line, and Telegram to keep all your customers active and make them come back. Centralize all your customer interactions, take or update orders, and schedule promotional campaigns under one workspace.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform : Helping Businesses with WhatsApp Broadcasting Automation, Live Chat & Chatbots
All-in-One WhatsApp Solutions for Enterprises & MSMEs
